author: ate
msg: Checking in Eclipse WTP obligatory and always added folders and (empty/dummy) MANIFEST.MF files

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented the W3C conformance tests for the Widget-Updates spec at the parser level; also updated the UDD parser to catch bad HTTP codes and content-types using HTTPClient to retrieve the UDD rather than let JDOM swallow them. See WOOKIE-103. Note that some tests fail or generate errors at the moment - I've reported these to W3C as possible test problems.

author: ate
msg: Fixing issue with jetspeed:mvn -Dtarget=test failing on maven 3 (works on maven 2)
